entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as a character who has knowledge about Voldemort's mind and Harry's mind. He says that Voldemort fears connection with Harry's mind because it causes him pain.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned as the Dark Lord who tries to possess Harry's mind but fails due to the pain he experiences. Dumbledore says that Voldemort will not try to possess Harry again.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as a character whose mind Voldemort tries to possess. Dumbledore explains that Voldemort fears connection with Harry's mind because it causes him pain.

entities.name: severus snape
entities.description: Snape is mentioned as a character who has a conversation with Dumbledore about killing him after he dies.

relationships.description: Voldemort fears connection with Harry's mind because it causes him pain, as explained by Dumbledore.
Dumbledore and Snape have a conversation about killing Dumbledore after he dies.
